title: Can't use Vayne Chrome skin..
body: At champ select, after I lock, I don't see the option to change color for the chrome skin.

replies.body:
Heya - 

As others have mentioned, this is a known issue with new champion select. Should be resolved next patch!

Unable to purchase skins in new champ select.
Unable to select chromas in new champ select.
Unable to select ward skins in new champ select.
Unable to disable animations in new champ select.
Champion ability details do not show on mouse hover.



~Riot NaKyle~
same cant find bards bloom either
It's a known bug with the new champ select
